title: 94/756/EC: Commission Decision of 21 November 1994 on the list of programmes of checks aimed at the prevention of zoonoses qualifying for a financial contribution from the Community in 1995
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 November 1994 on the list of programmes of checks aimed at the prevention of zoonoses qualifying for a financial contribution from the Community in 1995 (94/756/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The programme listed in the Annex hereto shall qualify for a financial contribution from the Community in 1995.
2. For the programme referred to in paragraph 1, the proposed rate and amount of the Community financial contribution shall be as set out in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
